lyrics.text: Lesson 135. The latest report. Listen to the tape, then answer this question. Is Karen
lyrics.translation: 第135课。阅读最新的报告。听录音，然后回答这个问题。卡伦是吗？

lyrics.text: Marsh going to retire, do you think? Are you really going to retire, Miss Marsh?
lyrics.translation: 马什要退休了，你觉得呢？马什小姐，你真的要退休吗？

lyrics.text: I may. I can't make up my mind. I will have to ask my future husband. He won't let me make another film.
lyrics.translation: 我可能会。我还没下定决心。我得问问我未来的丈夫。他不会让我再拍电影的。
你未来的丈夫，马什小姐？

lyrics.text: Yes. Let me introduce him to you. His name is Carlos. We're going to get married next week.
lyrics.translation: 好的。让我来介绍他给你认识。他的名字是卡洛斯。我们下周就要结婚了。

lyrics.text: Look Liz, here's another report about Karen Marsh. Listen. Karen Marsh, the latest. At her London hotel today, Miss Marsh told reporters she might retire.
lyrics.translation: 看，Liz，这是关于Karen Marsh的另一篇报道。听好了。Karen Marsh，最新动态。今天在她在伦敦的酒店，Marsh小姐告诉记者她可能会退休。

lyrics.text: She said she couldn't make up her mind. She said she would have to ask her future husband. She said her future husband would not let her make another film.
lyrics.translation: 她说她无法下定决心。她说她得去问问她未来的丈夫。她说她未来的丈夫不会让她再拍电影。

lyrics.text: Then she introduced us to Carlos and told us they would get married next week. That's sensational news, isn't it Kate? It certainly is. He'll be her sixth husband.
lyrics.translation: 然后她把我们介绍给卡洛斯，并告诉我们他们下周就要结婚了。这真是轰动一时的新闻，不是吗，凯特？当然。他将是她的第六任丈夫。
